mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.paper_type AS "paperType", a.use_type AS "useType", a.type AS "type", a.question AS "question", a.answer_content AS "answerContent", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_question( paper_type, use_type, type, question, answer_content, create_time ) VALUES ( #{paperType}, #{useType}, #{type}, #{question}, #{answerContent}, #{createTime} )

mapper.select: select id from exam_question where use_type = #{useType} and paper_type = #{paperType}
